name: My Global Game Jam Is Over 2023 Roots
name_original: My Global Game Jam Is Over 2023 Roots
description:
This years Global Game Jam 2023 is with the theme "Roots". My idea is that Game Jams are the roots of the international community of computer game players and creators. This was my first Global Game Jam and I wanted, first and foremost to meet the community in Lisbon. I have made a little game that documents my experience.

A little GB Studio Game Boy game using the Game Boy Camera.
Play it in browser and download the ROM for Emulator or Game Boy hardware.
No Sound.

Buttons; usual set on the Game Boy hardware.

Keyboard; Directional buttons, Z, X, Enter, Shift
